title: Rain Expected After Massive Snowfall In Buffalo
teaser: It has stopped snowing in the Buffalo area, but the rain in the forecast is leading to worries about possible floods and more roof collapses.
contentencoded:
It has stopped snowing in the Buffalo area, but now rain in the forecast is leading to worries about possible floods and more roof collapses. Brian Meyer of WBFO in Buffalo joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with the latest.

Guest

  • Brian Meyer, news director at WBFO. He tweets @BrianMeyerWBFO.
